sentence.Network_en: I imagine they'll be tearing the building down sooner or later.
sentence.Network_cn: 我猜他们早晚会拆除这座楼的。

sentence.Network_en: No sooner had he arrived in Rome than he was kidnapped.
sentence.Network_cn: 他刚到罗马就遭到了绑架。

sentence.Network_en: Sooner or later she would be caught by the police.
sentence.Network_cn: 她迟早会被警方逮住的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 考研英语词汇后缀大全(也可能不全) - 豆丁网 ... stationery 文具 94. - sooner 更早的 95. - linger 逗留 96. -.
Dangers foreseen are the sooner prevented., 危险若被预见 , 则可及早提防.
the sooner , the better ., 越快越好.

but if this had happened in Mexico over the past few months , the generals of global health would have seen that something was coming down from the hills and they could have mobilised sooner .但是如果过去几个月里墨西哥拥有这样的条件，统率世界卫生的将军们就能发现有危险逼近并且更快地动员起来。

list.abs: 无标题文档 ... sooner or later 迟早，早晚 would sooner 宁愿，宁可 out of sorts 身体不适，心情不佳.
非谓语动词 - 豆丁网 ... would rather （宁愿）， would sooner （宁愿）， as soon （宁愿），.
英语四级技巧_百度知道 ... since then 从那时起 sooner than 早于┄; speed up 加速.
四级短语总汇 - 豆丁网 ... so far 迄今为止 sooner orlater 迟早,早晚 step by step 逐步地.
2011中考起跑预备：高频词汇详解（6） ... 3. no more 不再 4. no sooner 刚……就……； 2. to the north 在……北方（不相接）.
2011中考起跑预备：高频词汇详解（6） ... 3. no more 不再 4. no sooner 刚……就……； 2. to the north 在……北方（不相接）.

entry.def: Sooner is the comparative of soon.
You say the sooner the better when you think something should be done as soon as possible.

example.ex: Detective Holt said: 'The kidnapper is a man we must catch and the sooner the better'.
example.tran: 霍尔特侦探说：“绑架者是一名男子，我们必须抓住他，越快越好。”

entry.def: If you say that something will happen sooner or later, you mean that it will happen at some time in the future, even though it might take a long time.

example.ex: Sooner or later she would be caught by the police.
example.tran: 她迟早会被警方逮住的。

entry.def: If you say that no sooner has one thing happened than another thing happens, you mean that the second thing happens immediately after the first thing.

example.ex: No sooner had he arrived in Rome than he was kidnapped.
example.tran: 他刚到罗马就遭到了绑架。

entry.def: If you say that you would sooner do something or you'd sooner do it, you mean that you would prefer to do it.

example.ex: Ford vowed that he would sooner burn his factory to the ground than build a single vehicle for war purposes...
example.tran: 福特郑重声明他宁可把自己的工厂付之一炬，也不愿意生产一辆用于战争的车辆。

example.ex: I'd sooner not talk about it...

sentences.sentence: "Come a little sooner, if you can"
"clean it well, preferably with warm water"

auth_sentence.content: I'd far sooner the word impairment was used.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'd far sooner the word impairment was used.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'd far sooner the word impairment was used.

auth_sentence.content: They effectively seem to 'burn themselves out' sooner.
auth_sentence.res_content: They effectively seem to 'burn themselves out' sooner.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They effectively seem to 'burn themselves out' sooner.

auth_sentence.content: This needs to be corrected sooner rather than later.

Sentence.sentence: The greater the difference, the sooner and more thoroughly the new technology replaces the old.
iPhones and iPods will replace laptops sooner or later
It will see a rebound sooner or later
Another Ebola epidemic may erupt sooner or later.

means.word_mean: (要求)一说就办；说了就立即做

sentences.en: When he said he wanted to go to the zoo on his birthday it was no sooner said than done.
sentences.cn: 他一说他生日那天想去动物园，立刻就照做了。

sentences.en: No sooner had she got in the bath than the front door bell rang.
sentences.cn: 她刚进浴室，前门的门铃就响了。

sentences.en: ‘When shall I tell him?’ ‘The sooner the better.’
sentences.cn: “我什么时候告诉他？”“越快越好。”

sentences.en: The police will find him sooner or later.
We urged them to sort out the problem sooner rather than later.
sentences.cn: 我们敦促他们及早解决那个问题。

means.word_mean: 宁愿做某事(而不愿做另一件事)

sentences.en: She’d sooner share a house with other students than live at home with her parents.
sentences.cn: 她宁可和其他学生合住，也不愿跟父母住在家里。
